name: Tom´s venture - Asteroids - Study Project
description:
Third Game Developed - Asteroid remake made for study purposes.
Controls: 

W/A/S/D - Movements

space - shot

1 and 2 - select weapons

* Animations are not playing on WebGL build for some bug(press any key to skip the scenes).
___________________________________

3D art, UI art, animations and Programming:

Pedro Stradioto

Credits:

Earth Stage music - cynicmusic (https://opengameart.org/users/cynicmusic)

Moon Stage music - tcarisland (https://opengameart.org/users/tcarisland)

Saturn Stage music -  maxStack (https://opengameart.org/users/maxstack)

Main Menu Music - akikazer (https://opengameart.org/users/akikazer)

Game Over Music -  insydnis (https://opengameart.org/users/insydnis)

Victory music -  Eliot Corley from ChaosIsHarmony (https://opengameart.org/users/el-corleo)
